programme.title: Queen of the Damned
programme.desc: The vampire Lestat (Stuart Townsend) awakens after 100 years, becomes a rock star and unites with a female counterpart (Aaliyah).

programme.title: The Long Kiss Goodnight
programme.desc: Former cohorts come after a small-town New England mom who gradually remembers her past as a government assassin.

programme.title: Dolemite
programme.desc: A wrongly jailed man (Rudy Ray Moore) and his female kung-fu friends seek vengeance on the rival (D'Urville Martin) who put him away.

programme.title: The Human Tornado
programme.desc: A fat rhymer (Rudy Ray Moore) flees to California, where he helps a madam (Lady Reed) and her female fighters battle a local gangster.

programme.title: Petey Wheatstraw, the Devil's Son-in-Law
programme.desc: Hoping for a grandchild, the devil sends his minions to find the man (Rudy Ray Moore) who promised to marry his ugly daughter (Eboni Wryte).

programme.title: It's Showtime at the Apollo
programme.desc: Guests are Run-D.M.C., LeVert, Rude Boys featuring Gerald Levert, and comedian James Stephens III.

programme.title: It's Showtime at the Apollo
programme.desc: Sinbad; Public Enemy; Omar Chandler; Flex; Steve Harvey; Simply Marvelous.

programme.title: It's Showtime at the Apollo
programme.desc: Guest host Mario Van Peebles; Heavy D and the Boyz perform, Ex-Girlfriend sings and comedy by Ralph Harris.

programme.title: It's Showtime at the Apollo
programme.desc: Rising comics and singers are showcased.

programme.title: The Bachelor Party
programme.desc: As a man (Lamman Rucker) prepares to marry the woman of his dreams, an evening of fun and frolic with his friends turns bitter as tempers flare.

programme.title: Switchin' the Script
programme.desc: During a weekend corporate retreat, Lonnie's best friends convince her to take control when dealing with men. Lonnie's new attitude impresses every man she meets, especially her boss's good-looking son, David.

programme.title: No Regrets
programme.desc: A flight attendant finally agrees to marry her college sweetheart after 12 years of proposals. But after meeting a handsome divorcee during a layover in Los Angeles, she finds herself in a compromising position that she never thought she'd be in.

programme.title: Jerico
programme.desc: Best friends embark on a journey through the Jim Crow South.

programme.title: Judge Dad
programme.desc: Sadie is suing Petra for ruining her prize-winning rose bushes by using her garden as a personal flower shop.

programme.title: Judge Dad
programme.desc: Edna is suing her ex-husband Clovis for the money she paid to get him his green card after they were married.

programme.title: Judge Mom
programme.desc: Darren says he and his brother agreed to take their parents on a family trip; when it came time to pay up, Brady refused and said he never agreed to such an expensive trip, claiming Darren knew he couldn't afford the trip on his teacher salary.

programme.title: Crime Stoppers: Case Files
programme.desc: The unsolved murders of Lonzelle Booker and Vincent Nasca.

programme.title: Crime Stoppers: Case Files
programme.desc: The unsolved murders of Anthony Valle, Nelson Medrano and Torrey Jones.

programme.title: Crime Stoppers: Case Files
programme.desc: The unsolved murders of Isabel Torres and Keith Washington.

programme.title: Blackstar Warrior
programme.desc: In a 1970s version of the future, a space detective searching for the truth about his real mother uncovers his adoptive parents' secret genetics lab and discovers it's controlled by a space nun cult bent on taking over the galaxy.

programme.title: Boiling Point
programme.desc: A Treasury agent (Wesley Snipes) and a mobster (Dennis Hopper) hunt each other according to their separate-but-equal deadlines for success.
